newsitem.title: USA: RESEARCH ALERT - Itron downgraded by UBS.
newsitem.headline: RESEARCH ALERT - Itron downgraded by UBS.

text.p: -- Itron Inc was downgraded to hold from buy by UBS Securities after the utility meter company posted quarterly results that were worse than the company warned of last month, analyst Jeffrey Schlesinger said.
-- UBS cut its 1997 earnings estimate for the company to $0.45 a share from $1.40.

-- He said the company's results in the current quarter would be flat sequentially, which would give it earnings of about $0.02 a share for the year excluding onetime charges, compared with $0.79 in 1995.
